descriptionHtml:
Gives Death Hounds blue eyes, to match the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52872]Vampire Eyes of Coldharbour[/url]﻿ mod. I just thought it looked nice, so I did it for the hounds, so they match.


[u][size=3]Requires Dawnguard.
[/size][/u]

[size=3]Conflicts:[/size]
Literally anything which replaces the Death Hound model or texture. If any mods which do so are found, I will add them here aswell.
[size=3]

[/size][size=3]Recommended mods:[/size]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52872]Vampire Eyes of Coldharbour[/url]﻿ by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2845280]GendunDrup[/url], cause, well, that what this was made for.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36158/?]Necromancy-- Undead FX[/url]﻿ by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4640202]WDog367[/url], is cool mang, and has [i]more[/i] blue eyes.
author: Sir Squidly

files.name: Death Hound Eyes of Coldharbour - FIXED
